meta.Summary:: Very serious injury to the 13 year old co-driver of a powerboat following a collision in a junior offshore powerboat race in Portland harbour on 19 June 2005. Safety concerns regarding marine safety helmets have been highlighted.

title: Safety Bulletin 3/2005
raw_html:
Report name:
Safety Bulletin 3/2005
Incident date:
19 June 2005
Category:
Leisure
Summary:
Very serious injury to the 13 year old co-driver of a powerboat following a collision in a junior offshore powerboat race in Portland harbour on 19 June 2005. Safety concerns regarding marine safety helmets have been highlighted.

body:
Very serious injury to the 13 year old co-driver of a powerboat following a collision in a junior offshore powerboat race in Portland harbour on 19 June 2005. Safety concerns regarding marine safety helmets have been highlighted.
